CustomField.formula: IF(Apttus_Config2__IsOptionRollupLine__c && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.Category__c, '')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APTS_Price_Structure__c, '')) && NOT(ISBLANK( Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_Postcode__c )) && (ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__ChargeType__c, 'eParcel Returns - Delivery Fee (per article)') || ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__ChargeType__c, 'Parcel Post Call for Returns - Pick-up Fee (per request)') || ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__ChargeType__c, 'Parcel Post Call for Returns - Delivery Fee (per article)')), Apttus_Config2__NetPrice__c , NULL)
CustomField.label: Price
